words.meaning: 离开；走开; 断掉(电、水等); 完 prep.(表示脱离)
干净的；清洁的 v.打扫；弄干净；擦干净
极其重要的，必不可少的
words.example: Proper preparation is essential for a successful experiment.
She can speak English fluently.

words.meaning: 合用；分享 n.(C)一份；股票
基地；基础 v,为……打基础

words.example: The structure of this sentence is very clear.

words.meaning: 顶部 adj. 居首位的；最上面的
(U/C)烦恼；困难；麻烦；问题 nt.使麻烦；使苦恼
稳定的；牢固的；持续不变的
words.example: The situation is becoming more stable now.

words.meaning: (C/U)练习；操练；实践 ; v. 练习；操练；实践 (美)

words.example: Adjectives modify nouns, and adverbs modify verbs.

words.meaning: （对已婚女性的称呼）太太，夫人（Mrs. + 姓）
words.example: Mrs. Smith is our neighbor.

words.meaning: 女士（不强调婚姻状况，Ms. + 姓）
words.example: Ms. Lee will teach us today.
Mr. Brown is the manager.
We can merge the two sentences into one.
You may sacrifice sleep to study, but it isn't healthy.
Many students in the USA volunteer in summer.

words.meaning: 关键词；检索/定位信息的核心词
words.example: Underline keywords in the question before reading the passage.
Alice spends the entire summer at her grandmother’s house.
He studied the entire night.

words.meaning: 后置的（放在被修饰词后面）
words.example: “something interesting” uses a postpositive adjective.

words.meaning: 短语；词组（不是完整句子）
words.example: “in the morning” is a phrase, not a sentence.

words.meaning: 罪魁祸首；造成问题的人/事
words.example: Lack of practice is the culprit behind his mistakes.
A sentence has components like subject and verb.
Please bring your textbook to class.
Reading helps you build vocabulary.
Combine these two ideas with “and”.

phrases.example: The environment is getting worse day by day.
The city is becoming more and more crowded.
Please speak up so everyone can hear you.
The machine is controlled by a computer.
He doesn't have enough time.
We should help others in need.
It is hot in summer.
The apples are on the tree.
She has made great progress.

phrases.meaning: 离开家（更自然：leave home / leave the house）
phrases.example: Turn off the lights when you leave home.
We can plant some trees to clean the air.
Proper preparation is essential for a successful experiment.
We need more women into management.
He can speak a foreign language fluently.
She can speak English fluently.
Students share ideas on a website.

phrases.meaning: 婚姻状况未知（对应称呼常用 Ms.）
phrases.example: If you don't know her marital status, use Ms.
Whose book is this? It’s mine.
Is this your book? Yes, it is.
We shouldn't waste food.

phrases.meaning: 在不浪费任何食物的情况下
phrases.example: They cook meals without wasting any food.
Use a conjunction to merge sentences.
Many volunteers spend time helping others.
Young people in the USA often volunteer.
Young people can make a difference.
In this article, we learn about Jason.

phrases.meaning: 老人（the + adj. 表示一类人）
phrases.example: We should respect the old.

phrases.meaning: 教人们如何……（后面接 how to do sth.）
phrases.example: They teach people how to save energy.
He teaches people how to build houses.
What does he teach people? He teaches them math.

phrases.meaning: 把阅读量翻倍/增加一倍阅读
phrases.example: Try to double the reading time this month.
Reading makes me smarter.
Copy grammar points every day to remember them.
Review textbook words before the test.

phrases.meaning: 合并在一起（combine 本身就有“合并”之意）
phrases.example: Combine the two lists together and review them.

patterns.example: The environment is becoming more and more important.
I asked my teacher for help.
We learned the fact from the article.

grammar.title: 现在进行时
grammar.definition: 表示现在正在进行的动作，也可表示现阶段正在进行或即将发生的动作。
grammar.structure: 主语 + am/is/are + 动词-ing
usage: 表示说话时正在进行的动作：He is reading a book now.
表示现阶段正在进行的动作：She is learning French this year.
表示即将发生的动作（常用go, come, leave等）：I am leaving tomorrow.
与always连用表示赞扬或不满：He is always helping others.

mistakes.wrong: She is play the piano.
mistakes.explanation: be动词后面要用动词的-ing形式

mistakes.wrong: I am knowing the answer.
mistakes.explanation: know是状态动词，一般不用进行时

examples: They are watching TV at the moment.
We are having an English class now.

sub_topics.title: 现在进行时的用法
sub_topics.definition: 表示正在进行或现阶段正在发生的动作
usage: 表示说话时正在发生的动作
表示现阶段持续的动作
examples: She is studying English these days.

grammar.title: 动名词 (v.-ing作名词)
grammar.definition: 由动词-ing形式构成，具有名词性质，可以作主语、宾语、表语等。
grammar.structure: 动词-ing
usage: 作主语：Swimming is good for health.
作宾语：I enjoy reading books. / Thank you for helping me.
作表语：My hobby is collecting stamps.
某些动词后只能接动名词：enjoy, finish, mind, practice, avoid, consider等

mistakes.wrong: I enjoy to swim.
mistakes.explanation: enjoy后只能接动名词，不能接不定式

mistakes.wrong: Thank you for help me.
mistakes.explanation: 介词后要用动名词

examples: Would you mind opening the window?
She is good at playing the piano.

sub_topics.title: 动名词作宾语
usage: 表示习惯或喜好

sub_topics.title: 动名词作主语 + 动词第三人称单数
动词-ing与动词原形作宾补的区别
动名词作主语 + 谓语
动名词作主语（reading books makes...）
sub_topics.definition: 动词-ing 形式作主语，视为单数
sub_topics.structure: 动名词短语 + 谓语（三单）
usage: 表示一件事

grammar.title: 第三人称单数
grammar.definition: 第三人称单数
grammar.structure: 第三人称单数变化规则
examples: Some children have trouble with reading.

sub_topics.title: 第三人称单数变化规则
sub_topics.definition: 一般现在时中第三人称单数变化
usage: 主语是第三人称单数

sub_topics.title: 第三人称单数 + 动词s/es
第三人称单数的定义与用法
sub_topics.definition: 主语为第三人称单数时动词变化规则
usage: he / she / it
单数名词

sub_topics.title: 第三人称单数的判定与用法

grammar.title: 主语
grammar.definition: 主语的含义
grammar.structure: 主语缺失问题

sub_topics.title: 主语缺失问题
sub_topics.definition: 英语句子必须有明确主语
sub_topics.structure: 主语 + 谓语 + 宾语
usage: 不能用逗号连接两个完整句
必要时用it作形式主语
examples: It is important to protect nature.

grammar.title: say/tell/speak/talk辨析
grammar.definition: 四个表示'说'的动词用法不同：say强调说的内容，tell强调告诉某人，speak强调说某种语言，talk强调交谈。
grammar.structure: say sth. / tell sb. sth. / speak + 语言 / talk to/with sb. about sth.
usage: say：强调说的内容，say sth., say to sb.
tell：告诉某人，tell sb. sth., tell sb. to do sth., tell a story/lie/joke
speak：说某种语言，演讲，speak English, speak to sb.
talk：交谈，talk to/with sb., talk about sth.

mistakes.wrong: He said me the news.
mistakes.explanation: tell后可直接接双宾语，say不可以

mistakes.wrong: Can you tell English?
mistakes.explanation: 说某种语言用speak

mistakes.wrong: I want to say with you.
mistakes.correct: I want to talk with you.
mistakes.explanation: 与某人交谈用talk with

examples: They are talking about the movie.

sub_topics.title: tell的固定用法（tell sb. to do sth.）
sub_topics.definition: tell表示命令或告知去做某事
usage: 不能用doing
examples: The teacher told us to be quiet.

sub_topics.title: say、speak、talk、tell的区别
sub_topics.definition: 四个动词在用法和侧重点上不同
usage: 注意固定搭配

sub_topics.title: tell与talk的用法区别
sub_topics.definition: tell强调告诉内容，talk强调交谈
sub_topics.structure: tell sb. sth.; talk to/with sb.
usage: tell后直接接内容
talk常与介词搭配

sub_topics.title: talk的固定搭配用法
sub_topics.definition: talk常与不同介词搭配，意义不同
sub_topics.structure: talk about / talk to / talk with
usage: talk about 表示谈论内容
talk to/with 表示与某人交谈

grammar.title: 被动语态
grammar.definition: 当主语是动作的承受者时，使用被动语态。强调动作的承受者或动作本身。
grammar.structure: 主语 + be + 过去分词 + (by + 动作执行者)
usage: 不知道或不必说明动作执行者：The window was broken.
强调动作承受者：The book was written by Lu Xun.
客观报道或正式场合：The meeting will be held tomorrow.
各种时态的被动：is done, was done, will be done, has been done等

mistakes.wrong: The car was repair yesterday.
mistakes.explanation: be后面要用动词的过去分词

mistakes.wrong: The book is belonged to me.
mistakes.explanation: belong是不及物动词，没有被动语态

examples: English is spoken all over the world.
The work must be finished on time.

sub_topics.title: 被动语态的基本结构
usage: 不知道或不强调动作执行者
examples: The room is cleaned every day.

sub_topics.title: be + 过去分词
usage: 强调承受动作

sub_topics.title: 被动语态结构
usage: 不知道或不强调执行者

sub_topics.title: 被动语态结构（be + 过去分词）
sub_topics.definition: 表示主语是动作的承受者
sub_topics.structure: 主语 + be + 过去分词 (+ by...)
usage: 不知道或不强调动作执行者
强调结果

sub_topics.title: 被动语态的用法
sub_topics.definition: 表示动作的承受者是主语
sub_topics.structure: 主语 + be + 过去分词
usage: 强调动作的承受者
不知道或不强调动作执行者

grammar.title: 一般过去时
grammar.definition: 表示过去某一时间发生的动作或存在的状态，也表示过去经常或反复发生的动作。
grammar.structure: 主语 + 动词过去式（be动词用was/were）
usage: 表示过去发生的动作：I visited my grandma yesterday.
表示过去存在的状态：He was a teacher ten years ago.
表示过去的习惯：When I was young, I often played football.

mistakes.wrong: I go to Beijing last year.
mistakes.correct: I went to Beijing last year.
mistakes.explanation: 有过去时间标志词（last year），动词要用过去式

mistakes.wrong: Did you went there?
mistakes.explanation: did后面的动词要用原形

examples: She bought a new dress yesterday.
They were happy at the party.
I didn't watch TV last night.

sub_topics.title: 一般过去时的用法
usage: 与过去时间状语连用

grammar.title: 现在完成时
grammar.definition: 表示过去发生的动作对现在造成的影响或结果，也表示从过去持续到现在的动作或状态。
grammar.structure: 主语 + have/has + 过去分词
usage: 表示过去的动作对现在的影响：I have lost my key. (现在没有钥匙)
表示经历：Have you ever been to Beijing?
表示持续到现在的状态：I have lived here for 10 years.
常与already, yet, just, ever, never, for, since连用

mistakes.wrong: I have see the movie.
mistakes.explanation: have/has后面要用动词的过去分词形式

mistakes.wrong: I have bought this book yesterday.
mistakes.explanation: 有具体过去时间（yesterday），不能用现在完成时

mistakes.wrong: He has gone to Beijing for 3 days.
mistakes.correct: He has been in Beijing for 3 days.
mistakes.explanation: have gone表示去了还没回来，不能与for连用

examples: She has already finished her homework.
I have never met him before.
We have known each other since 2020.

sub_topics.title: 现在完成时的基本结构
sub_topics.definition: 表示过去发生并对现在有影响
usage: 强调结果或经验

sub_topics.title: have/has + 过去分词
usage: 表示完成或经验

sub_topics.title: 现在完成时结构
sub_topics.definition: 表示过去发生并影响现在的动作
usage: 经验
结果
持续

sub_topics.title: 现在完成时结构（have/has + 过去分词）
sub_topics.definition: 表示过去发生的动作对现在有影响
sub_topics.structure: 主语 + have/has + 过去分词
usage: 强调结果或经历
常与 already, ever 连用

sub_topics.title: 现在完成时的用法
sub_topics.definition: 表示过去发生的动作对现在产生影响
sub_topics.structure: 主语 + have/has + 过去分词
usage: 表示已完成的动作
表示经验或结果

grammar.title: 介宾短语
grammar.definition: 介宾短语
grammar.structure: 介词后接名词或动名词

sub_topics.title: 介词后接名词或动名词
sub_topics.definition: 介词后不能直接接动词原形
usage: 常考语法点

sub_topics.title: 介词短语
usage: 作定语或状语

sub_topics.title: 介词后接名词
sub_topics.definition: 介词后必须接名词或动名词
usage: 表示时间地点方式等

grammar.title: it强调句
grammar.definition: it强调句
grammar.structure: it强调句

sub_topics.title: it is + 形容词 + for sb.
it is + 形容词 + to do sth.
it is + 形容词 + for sb. + to do sth.

grammar.title: 形容词用法
grammar.definition: 形容词用法
grammar.structure: 形容词+名词搭配

sub_topics.title: 形容词加名词构成名词短语
sub_topics.definition: 形容词修饰名词，构成完整名词短语
usage: 描述事物特征

grammar.title: 词性转换
grammar.definition: 名词与动词同形/加e变化
grammar.structure: 名词与动词同形/加e变化

sub_topics.title: 名词与动词同形/加e变化

grammar.title: 称谓
grammar.definition: 称谓
grammar.structure: 称谓用法（Miss/Mrs./Ms./Mr.）

grammar.title: 不定式 (to + 动词原形)
grammar.definition: 由to + 动词原形构成的非谓语动词形式，可以作主语、宾语、表语、定语、状语和宾语补足语。
grammar.structure: to + 动词原形
usage: 作宾语：I want to go home. / I decide to study hard.
作目的状语：I came here to see you.
作主语：To learn English well is important. = It is important to learn English well.
作宾语补足语：My mother asked me to clean the room.
作定语：I have something to tell you.

mistakes.wrong: I want go home.
mistakes.explanation: want后接不定式，必须有to

mistakes.wrong: He made me to cry.
mistakes.explanation: make/let/have等使役动词后用省略to的不定式

mistakes.wrong: I saw him to run.
mistakes.explanation: 感官动词see/hear/watch后用省略to的不定式或-ing

examples: She decided to become a doctor.
It's kind of you to help me.
I don't know what to do.

sub_topics.title: 不定式
sub_topics.definition: to do形式，可作多种成分
usage: 目的、宾语、主语

sub_topics.title: 不定式作宾语补足语
sub_topics.definition: to do形式在宾语后补充说明宾语。
sub_topics.structure: 动词 + sb. + to do sth.
usage: ask, tell, want等动词后
examples: I want you to help me.

sub_topics.title: 动词不定式作宾补
sub_topics.structure: 动词 + 宾语 + to do
usage: 表示将要发生的动作
examples: She asked me to help her.

sub_topics.title: 动词不定式作宾语补足语
sub_topics.definition: 不定式用来补充说明宾语
sub_topics.structure: 动词 + sb. + to do sth.
usage: 常见于tell/ask/invite等动词后
examples: She asked me to help her.

grammar.title: 特殊疑问句
grammar.definition: 用特殊疑问词（what, who, where, when, why, how等）提问的句子，不能用yes或no回答。
grammar.structure: 特殊疑问词 + 一般疑问句语序（疑问词作主语时除外）
usage: what问什么：What is your name?
who问谁：Who is that man? / Who(m) did you see?
where问地点：Where do you live?
when问时间：When did you arrive?
why问原因：Why are you late?
how问方式/程度：How do you go to school? / How old are you?

mistakes.wrong: What you want?
mistakes.explanation: 特殊疑问句需要助动词（疑问词作主语时除外）

mistakes.wrong: Who did break the window?
mistakes.explanation: who作主语时，不需要助动词did

mistakes.wrong: How many book do you have?
mistakes.correct: How many books do you have?
mistakes.explanation: how many后面要用可数名词复数

examples: What time does the movie start?

sub_topics.title: 对划线部分提问的方法
sub_topics.definition: 将划线部分换成疑问词
sub_topics.structure: 疑问词 + 一般疑问句
usage: 注意时态
examples: He lives in Beijing. → Where does he live?

sub_topics.title: 特殊疑问句语序
sub_topics.definition: 特殊疑问句中疑问词置于句首。
sub_topics.structure: 疑问词 + 一般疑问句语序
usage: 对信息提问

sub_topics.title: 特殊疑问句（宾语提问）
sub_topics.structure: 疑问词 + 一般疑问句语序
usage: 提问动作对象

sub_topics.title: wh-疑问词 + 一般疑问句语序
特殊疑问句的构成
sub_topics.structure: 特殊疑问词 + 一般疑问句
usage: 提问时间地点原因等

sub_topics.title: what + 助动词 + 主语 + 动词原形
特殊疑问句结构（WH-词提问）
sub_topics.definition: 使用疑问词对句子成分提问
usage: what, who, where, why 等

sub_topics.title: what + 名词 + 一般疑问句

grammar.title: 代词 (人称/物主/反身/指示)
grammar.definition: 用来代替名词或名词短语的词，包括人称代词、物主代词、反身代词、指示代词等。
grammar.structure: 根据在句中的成分选择相应形式
usage: 人称代词主格（作主语）：I, you, he, she, it, we, they
人称代词宾格（作宾语）：me, you, him, her, it, us, them
形容词性物主代词（后接名词）：my, your, his, her, its, our, their
名词性物主代词（独立使用）：mine, yours, his, hers, its, ours, theirs
反身代词：myself, yourself, himself, herself, itself, ourselves, themselves

mistakes.wrong: Me and Tom are friends.
mistakes.explanation: 作主语用主格I，且把自己放后面

mistakes.wrong: This is her, not my.
mistakes.explanation: 独立使用时用名词性物主代词

mistakes.wrong: He hurt hisself.
mistakes.explanation: 反身代词是himself，不是hisself

examples: This is my book. That is yours.

grammar.title: 英语问句
grammar.definition: 英语问句
grammar.structure: 一般疑问句构成

sub_topics.title: 一般疑问句构成
usage: 语调上升

sub_topics.title: 特殊疑问句（对划线部分提问）
sub_topics.structure: 疑问词 + 一般疑问句
usage: 找准提问成分

sub_topics.title: 选择疑问句语调规则
sub_topics.structure: 一般疑问句 + or + 选项
usage: 用于选择

sub_topics.title: 选择疑问句语调
usage: 提供两种选择

grammar.title: 否定句
grammar.definition: 表示否定意义的句子
grammar.structure: be not / do not
usage: 注意助动词

grammar.title: 宾语从句
grammar.definition: 在复合句中作宾语的从句，通常放在主句谓语动词、介词或形容词之后。
grammar.structure: 主句 + 引导词(that/wh-/if/whether) + 陈述语序
usage: that引导（可省略）：I think (that) he is right.
wh-词引导：I don't know what his name is.
if/whether引导：I wonder if/whether he will come.
注意宾语从句要用陈述语序

mistakes.wrong: I don't know where is he.
mistakes.correct: I don't know where he is.
mistakes.explanation: 宾语从句要用陈述语序，不用疑问语序

mistakes.wrong: He asked me that where I lived.
mistakes.correct: He asked me where I lived.
mistakes.explanation: 特殊疑问词引导时不需要that

mistakes.wrong: I wonder if will he come.
mistakes.correct: I wonder if he will come.
mistakes.explanation: if引导的宾语从句要用陈述语序

examples: I believe that you can do it.
Could you tell me how I can get to the station?
I'm not sure whether it will rain tomorrow.

sub_topics.title: 宾语从句作宾语
sub_topics.structure: 主语 + 谓语 + 连词 + 从句
usage: 表达观点事实
examples: I know that he is right.

grammar.title: 动词形态
grammar.definition: 动词形态
grammar.structure: 不规则动词变化（ABB型、AAA型）

sub_topics.title: 不规则动词变化（ABB型、AAA型）
usage: 需单独记忆

sub_topics.title: 第三人称单数
sub_topics.definition: 第三人称单数作主语的规则
usage: 一般现在时

sub_topics.title: 不规则动词变化（grow-grew-grown）
usage: 需记忆

sub_topics.title: 不规则动词变化
sub_topics.definition: 部分动词的过去式和过去分词不按规则变化。
sub_topics.structure: 动词原形 → 不规则变化
usage: 需单独记忆

sub_topics.title: 动词过去式和过去分词的区别
sub_topics.definition: 过去式用于一般过去时，过去分词用于完成时或被动语态。
usage: 区分时态和语态

sub_topics.title: 动词过去式与过去分词（grow-grew-grown）
usage: 区分时态

sub_topics.title: 规则动词与不规则动词
动词原形/过去式/过去分词的区分（grow–grew–grown）
sub_topics.definition: 同一动词在不同时态和语态中的不同形式
sub_topics.structure: 原形 / 过去式 / 过去分词
usage: 一般时态 vs 完成/被动

sub_topics.title: 动词原形与过去式判断

grammar.title: 非谓语
grammar.definition: 非谓语
grammar.structure: 过去分词作形容词

sub_topics.title: 过去分词作形容词
sub_topics.definition: 过去分词表示被动或完成状态
usage: 修饰名词
强调状态

sub_topics.title: 不定式作宾语
usage: 常见于ask, want, hope等动词后

sub_topics.title: 过去分词的三种用法（完成时、被动语态、形容词）
不定式作目的状语
sub_topics.structure: 主语 + 动词 + to do
usage: 表示“为了……”
examples: He studies hard to pass the exam.

sub_topics.title: to do与doing的区别
sub_topics.definition: to do常表示目的或将来，doing常表示已发生或习惯。
usage: 根据动词固定搭配决定

sub_topics.title: 动词原形与to do的区别
sub_topics.definition: 原形用于助动词后，to do用于不定式结构。
usage: 区分句法功能

sub_topics.title: v-ing 作主语
sub_topics.definition: 动名词短语作主语，表示一件事。
usage: 描述行为或活动

grammar.title: There be句型
grammar.definition: 表示'某处存在某人或某物'的句型，be动词的形式由后面最近的名词决定（就近原则）。
grammar.structure: There + be(is/are/was/were) + 主语 + 地点/时间状语
usage: 表示存在：There is a book on the desk.
就近原则：There is a pen and two books on the desk.
各种时态：There will be / There has been / There used to be
否定和疑问：There isn't... / Is there...?

mistakes.wrong: There have a book on the desk.
mistakes.correct: There is a book on the desk.
mistakes.explanation: There be结构用be动词，不用have

mistakes.wrong: There are a pen and two books.
mistakes.correct: There is a pen and two books.
mistakes.explanation: 就近原则：be动词由最近的名词a pen决定

mistakes.wrong: There has a lot of water.
mistakes.correct: There is a lot of water.
mistakes.explanation: water是不可数名词，用is

examples: There are many students in the classroom.
Is there a hospital near here?
There will be a meeting tomorrow.

grammar.title: 定语
grammar.definition: 定语
grammar.structure: 后置定语

sub_topics.title: 后置定语
sub_topics.definition: 修饰名词且放在名词之后
usage: 多用于复杂修饰

grammar.title: 定语从句
grammar.definition: 在复合句中修饰名词或代词的从句，通常紧跟在被修饰的词（先行词）之后。
grammar.structure: 先行词 + 关系词(who/which/that/whose/where/when) + 从句
usage: who/that指人：The man who/that is talking is my father.
which/that指物：The book which/that I bought is interesting.
whose表所属：The girl whose mother is a doctor is my friend.
where指地点：This is the school where I studied.
when指时间：I still remember the day when I met you.

mistakes.wrong: The man which is talking is my teacher.
mistakes.correct: The man who/that is talking is my teacher.
mistakes.explanation: 先行词是人时，用who或that，不用which

mistakes.wrong: The book who I bought is good.
mistakes.correct: The book which/that I bought is good.
mistakes.explanation: 先行词是物时，用which或that，不用who

mistakes.wrong: This is the place where I visited.
mistakes.correct: This is the place which/that I visited.
mistakes.explanation: visit是及物动词，需要宾语，用which/that而非where

examples: I have a friend who can speak five languages.
The movie that we saw last night was exciting.
I'll never forget the day when I graduated.

sub_topics.title: 定语从句（that引导）
usage: that作主语或宾语
examples: The book that I like is interesting.

sub_topics.title: 定语从句（后置定语）
sub_topics.definition: 修饰名词的从句，通常放在名词后
sub_topics.structure: 名词 + 关系词 + 从句
usage: that / who / which 等
examples: The boy who is reading is my brother.

grammar.title: 后置定语
grammar.definition: 后置定语
grammar.structure: 介词短语作后置定语

sub_topics.title: 介词短语作后置定语
sub_topics.definition: 介词短语放在名词后作修饰成分
usage: 结构较复杂时常后置
examples: The apple on the tree is red.

grammar.title: 双宾语结构
grammar.definition: 双宾语结构
grammar.structure: 双宾语结构（teach sb. sth.）

sub_topics.title: 双宾语结构（teach sb. sth.）
sub_topics.definition: 一个动词后接两个宾语
sub_topics.structure: 动词 + 间接宾语 + 直接宾语
usage: teach, give, show 等

grammar.title: the+形容词表示一类人
grammar.definition: 表示某一类人
grammar.structure: the + 形容词
usage: 泛指群体
examples: The rich should help the poor.

grammar.title: 句子结构
grammar.definition: 句字结构
grammar.structure: 主语、谓语、宾语

sub_topics.title: 主语、谓语、宾语
sub_topics.structure: 主语 + 谓语 + 宾语
usage: 主语多为名词
谓语为动词

sub_topics.title: 主谓一致（动名词作主语视为单数）
sub_topics.definition: 动名词短语作主语看作单数
usage: 常见考点

sub_topics.title: 主谓宾结构
sub_topics.definition: 英语基本句型，由主语、谓语和宾语组成。
sub_topics.structure: 主语 + 动词 + 宾语
usage: 表达完整意义

sub_topics.title: 主语谓语宾语的基本结构
sub_topics.structure: 主语 + 谓语 + 宾语
usage: 陈述事实

sub_topics.title: 主语-谓语-宾语基本句型
sub_topics.definition: 英语最基本的句子结构
sub_topics.structure: 主语 + 谓语 + 宾语
usage: 多数及物动词句型

grammar.title: 形容词/副词比较级
grammar.definition: 用于两者之间的比较，表示'更...'的意思。
grammar.structure: 形容词/副词比较级 + than / more + 形容词/副词原级 + than
usage: 单音节和部分双音节词：加-er（tall→taller, big→bigger）
多音节和部分双音节词：more + 原级（beautiful→more beautiful）
不规则变化：good/well→better, bad/badly→worse, many/much→more
比较级的修饰词：much, a lot, even, still, a little

mistakes.wrong: She is more taller than me.
mistakes.explanation: tall是单音节词，用-er形式，不需要more

mistakes.wrong: He runs more fast than me.
mistakes.explanation: fast的比较级是faster，不是more fast

mistakes.wrong: This book is more better.
mistakes.correct: This book is better / much better.
mistakes.explanation: good的比较级是better，不能用more修饰

examples: My sister is two years older than me.
This question is more difficult than that one.
He works much harder than before.

sub_topics.title: 比较级递增结构（more and more）
sub_topics.definition: 表示程度不断加深，意为“越来越……”。
sub_topics.structure: more and more + 形容词/副词
usage: 描述变化趋势
常用于抽象概念
examples: The weather is getting more and more cold.
English is becoming more and more important.

sub_topics.title: 比较级用法
sub_topics.structure: 形容词/副词比较级 + than
usage: 比较两个人或事物
强调程度变化
examples: This book is more interesting than that one.

grammar.title: 助动词do/does/did
grammar.definition: 帮助构成疑问句和否定句
grammar.structure: do/does/did + 动词原形
usage: does用于第三人称单数
did用于过去时

sub_topics.title: 助动词do的用法
sub_topics.definition: do用于构成疑问句、否定句或强调。
usage: 一般现在时和一般过去时

sub_topics.title: 助动词
sub_topics.definition: 帮助主要动词构成时态、语态或语气。
usage: 构成疑问、否定、完成时、被动

sub_topics.title: do/does/did + 主语 + 动词原形

grammar.title: 动词
grammar.definition: 动词
grammar.structure: 动词

grammar.title: 名词单复数
grammar.definition: 名词单复数
grammar.structure: singular

sub_topics.title: singular
usage: 表示一个

sub_topics.title: plural
usage: 表示多个

grammar.title: 宾语
grammar.definition: 宾语
grammar.structure: 双宾语结构

sub_topics.title: 双宾语结构
sub_topics.definition: 一个动词后接两个宾语
usage: tell, teach, give常见

grammar.title: 情态动词
grammar.definition: 表示说话人的语气或态度的动词，后接动词原形，没有人称和数的变化。
grammar.structure: 主语 + 情态动词 + 动词原形
usage: can/could 表能力、许可、可能：I can swim. / Could you help me?
may/might 表许可、可能：May I come in? / It may rain.
must 表必须、肯定推测：You must finish it. / He must be at home.
should 表应该、建议：You should study hard.
need 表需要（否定needn't）：You needn't worry.

mistakes.wrong: He can swims.
mistakes.explanation: 情态动词后接动词原形，不加-s

mistakes.wrong: Must I finish it? — No, you mustn't.
mistakes.correct: Must I finish it? — No, you needn't/don't have to.
mistakes.explanation: must的否定回答用needn't或don't have to，mustn't表禁止

mistakes.wrong: He must be not at home.
mistakes.explanation: must be的否定是can't be，不是must not be

examples: You must hand in your homework on time.

grammar.title: 状语从句
grammar.definition: 在复合句中作状语的从句，用来修饰主句，表示时间、条件、原因、目的、结果、让步等。
grammar.structure: 连词 + 从句，主句（从句可前可后）
usage: 时间状语从句：when, while, before, after, as soon as, until等
条件状语从句：if, unless (= if not)
原因状语从句：because, since, as
让步状语从句：although/though, even if/though
结果状语从句：so...that..., such...that...

mistakes.wrong: If it will rain tomorrow, I will stay at home.
mistakes.correct: If it rains tomorrow, I will stay at home.
mistakes.explanation: 在条件状语从句中，用一般现在时表将来

mistakes.wrong: Although he is tired, but he keeps working.
mistakes.correct: Although he is tired, he keeps working.
mistakes.explanation: although和but不能同时使用

mistakes.wrong: Because I was ill, so I didn't go to school.
mistakes.correct: Because I was ill, I didn't go to school.
mistakes.explanation: because和so不能同时使用

examples: I will call you as soon as I arrive.
Unless you work hard, you won't succeed.
He was so tired that he fell asleep immediately.

grammar.title: 并列句用and等连接词连接
grammar.definition: 两个或多个并列的词、短语或完整句子需要用并列连词（and/but/or/so等）连接，表达并列、转折、选择、因果等关系。
grammar.structure: clause 1 + conjunction + clause 2（如：..., and ...）
usage: 连接两个并列的完整句子时，必须用并列连词或使用分号；不能只用逗号。
and 表示并列/递进；but 表示转折；or 表示选择；so 表示结果/因此。
并列句中常见：相同主语可在第二分句省略（口语/写作需注意清晰）。
examples: We should save energy, and we should plant more trees.
He wanted to go, but it was raining.
Do you want tea or coffee?

grammar.title: 逗号不能连接两句完整句子（comma splice）
grammar.definition: Comma splice 指用逗号直接连接两句独立完整句（independent clauses），这是英语写作中的常见错误。
grammar.structure: 错误：clause 1 , clause 2
usage: 改法1：用并列连词：clause 1, and/but/so/or clause 2。
改法2：用分号：clause 1; clause 2。
改法3：拆成两个句子：clause 1. Clause 2。
改法4：把其中一句变成从句/短语（如 because/when/which 等）。
examples: ❌ Protecting the environment is important, it makes our life better.
✅ Protecting the environment is important, and it makes our life better.
✅ Protecting the environment is important; it makes our life better.
✅ Protecting the environment is important. It makes our life better.

grammar.title: be动词的不同形式（am/is/are/was/were/been/being）
grammar.definition: be 是最常用的系动词/助动词之一，会随人称、数、时态变化，用于系表结构、进行时、被动语态等。
grammar.structure: am/is/are（一般现在）; was/were（一般过去）; been（过去分词）; being（现在分词）
usage: 系表结构：be + adj./n.（He is happy.）
进行时：be + doing（They are studying.）
被动语态：be + 过去分词（The house is controlled by a system.）
完成时中的被动/进行组合：have been + done; am/is/are being + done。
examples: The door is being painted now.

grammar.title: 时态总览（一般/进行/完成/将来等）
grammar.definition: 时态用于表示动作发生的时间与状态（是否正在进行、是否完成、是否将来等）。初中阶段重点掌握常见六大时态及其基本结构。
grammar.structure: 一般现在：do/does; 一般过去：did; 一般将来：will + do / be going to + do; 现在进行：am/is/are + doing; 过去进行：was/were + doing; 现在完成：have/has + done
usage: 一般现在：事实、习惯、规律（He plays basketball.）
一般过去：过去某时发生（He played yesterday.）
一般将来：将要发生（He will play tomorrow.）
进行时：某时正在发生（He is playing now.）
完成时：对现在有影响/经历/已完成（He has played before.）
时间状语词提示：now/yesterday/tomorrow/already/yet/since/for 等。
examples: She goes to school every day.
They were watching TV at 8 p.m. yesterday.
I have already done my homework.
We will visit the museum tomorrow.

grammar.title: do/does/did的选择规则（看原句动词时态与形式）
grammar.definition: 当句子里没有 be/情态动词/助动词可提前时，一般疑问句与否定句需要借助 do/does/did。选择哪一个取决于原句的时态与主语人称数。
grammar.structure: 一般疑问句：Do/Does/Did + 主语 + 动词原形...? 否定句：主语 + do/does/did + not + 动词原形
usage: 一般现在：主语第三人称单数用 does；其他用 do。
一般过去：统一用 did。
用了 does/did 后，后面动词必须回到原形（doesn't make / didn't make）。
如果原句已有 be/情态动词（am/is/are/can/will等），不再用 do/does/did。
examples: She likes apples. → Does she like apples? / She doesn't like apples.
They grow vegetables. → Do they grow vegetables?
He grew vegetables. → Did he grow vegetables?

grammar.title: 介词短语作地点/位置（on the top of）
grammar.definition: 介词短语可以表示地点/位置/方向等，在句中常作状语或后置定语。
grammar.structure: on/in/at/under/behind/... + 名词短语（如：on the top of the mountain）
usage: 作状语：说明“在哪里/在什么位置”（They live on the top of the hill.）。
作后置定语：修饰前面的名词（the apples on the tree）。
注意固定搭配：on the top of（在……顶端/顶部）。
examples: A flag is on the top of the building.
The house on the top of the hill looks beautiful.
Put the book on the desk.

grammar.title: 名词与动词拼写区别（bath/bathe；breath/breathe）
grammar.definition: 有些词名词与动词拼写只差一个 e，含义与读音也会变化，考试中常考辨析。
grammar.structure: bath（n.）→ bathe（v.）；breath（n.）→ breathe（v.)
usage: bath：洗澡（名词）; bathe：洗澡/给……洗澡（动词）。
breath：呼吸（名词，一口气）; breathe：呼吸（动词）。
做题时先判断词性：句子需要名词还是动词。
examples: He takes a bath every night.

grammar.title: 阅读题关键词定位法（题干关键词交叉定位）
grammar.definition: 阅读理解中先读题干，圈出关键词，再到原文中寻找同义替换或相关信息，快速定位答案区域。
grammar.structure: 题干关键词 → 原文定位 → 对比选项（找证据）
usage: 优先圈名词/专有名词/数字/地点时间等稳定词（如 USA, Alice, 18）。
在原文中找同义表达或改写（spend = pay, entire = whole）。
定位到段落后，再精读附近几句确认细节。
examples: Question: What does Jason do? → Keywords: Jason, do → Find “Jason” in the text → Read nearby sentences for evidence.

grammar.title: 阅读定位：两条信息交叉定位（答案在交叉点附近）
grammar.definition: 当题干提供两个条件（如人物+时间/地点+行为）时，要在原文中找到两条信息的交叉位置，答案通常在交叉点附近。
grammar.structure: 条件A定位范围 + 条件B定位范围 → 交叉区域精读
usage: 先找更容易定位的词（人名/大写缩写/数字），再找第二条件（summer/at 8:00 等）。
交叉区域附近常出现同义替换：entire summer = whole summer。
不要只找到一个条件就选答案，必须两条都对上。
examples: Alice + summer → Find “Alice” and “summer” → Answer is near where both appear.

grammar.title: 翻译方法：句子变长时找介词/连词，先处理修饰部分（从后往前翻）
grammar.definition: 英语长句常因介词短语、从句、非谓语等修饰成分变长。翻译时可先抓介词/连词/从句边界，先翻修饰部分，再回到主干（主谓宾）。
grammar.structure: 先主干（S-V-O）定位 → 标出介词/连词/从句 → 先翻修饰（常从后往前）→ 再整合成顺畅中文
usage: 看到 for/to/in/from/with/without/that/which/when 等，先判断它们引导的结构。
先处理：地点/时间/原因/目的等修饰信息，再翻主干信息。
避免逐词硬翻，优先保证逻辑顺序清晰。
examples: Proper preparation is essential for a successful experiment in science class.
→ 在科学课上，对一个成功的实验来说，合适的准备非常重要。

grammar.title: 句子成分：主谓宾（主语名词、谓语动词、宾语名词）
grammar.definition: 英语基本句型常以主语+谓语+宾语（SVO）构成。判断句子成分有助于选词性、选时态、改写疑问句。
grammar.structure: Subject（主语） + Verb（谓语） + Object（宾语）（可扩展补语/状语等）
usage: 主语通常是名词/代词/动名词短语（Reading books...）。
谓语必须是动词并体现时态（make/makes/made）。
宾语通常是名词/代词/从句（teach people how to...）。

grammar.title: 备考策略：语法点反复抄写记忆
grammar.definition: 通过“抄写+背诵+例句化”把常考结构（时态、被动、从句、疑问句等）形成自动反应，提高做题速度与稳定性。
grammar.structure: 知识点标题 → 结构公式 → 2-3个例句 → 常错点提醒
usage: 每天少量高频复习：时态结构、do/does/did、被动 be+done、宾语从句/定语从句。
每个知识点配固定例句，看到题目能直接套用。
复盘错题：把错因归类到对应语法点（例如 comma splice / 三单 / 介词后词性）。
examples: 知识点：does + 动词原形；例句：Does he like it? / He doesn't like it.

grammar.title: 分词
grammar.definition: 分词是动词的非谓语形式之一，包括现在分词（doing）与过去分词（done），可作定语、状语、补语等，也参与构成时态/语态。
grammar.structure: 现在分词：V-ing；过去分词：V-ed/不规则（done/gone/eaten）
usage: 现在分词作定语：a crying baby（正在哭的婴儿）。
过去分词作定语：an eaten apple（被吃过的苹果）。
进行时：be + doing；被动：be + done；完成时：have/has + done。
examples: The boy standing there is Tom.

grammar.title: tense（时态）
grammar.definition: 时态表示动作发生的时间与状态变化，是初中语法核心考点。
grammar.structure: 根据不同时态选择动词形式（do/does/did/doing/done/will do等）
usage: 看到时间标志词快速判断时态。
同一句中时态要与语境一致。
注意三单、否定与疑问的结构配套。
examples: He studies every day. (一般现在)
He is studying now. (现在进行)
He has studied for two hours. (现在完成)

grammar.title: modal（情态动词）
grammar.definition: 情态动词表达能力、可能、建议、义务等（can/may/must/should等），后面接动词原形。
grammar.structure: modal + 动词原形；否定：modal + not + 动词原形
usage: can：能力/允许；must：必须；should：建议；may：可能/允许。
情态动词提到句首可构成一般疑问句。
情态动词后不加 to，不加 -s，不加 -ed。

grammar.title: 从句
grammar.definition: 从句是依附于主句的句子成分，常见有宾语从句、定语从句、状语从句。
grammar.structure: 主句 + 连词/关系词 + 从句
usage: 宾语从句：作宾语（I know that he is 18.）。
定语从句：修饰名词（families that are not rich）。
状语从句：表时间/原因/条件等（when/because/if...）。
examples: I think that she is right.
The man who called me is my uncle.
When it rains, we stay home.

grammar.title: 名词
grammar.definition: 名词表示人、物、地点、抽象概念等，可作主语、宾语、表语等；还涉及可数/不可数、单复数等考点。
grammar.structure: 可数名词：a/an + 单数；复数加-s/-es；不可数名词不加复数
usage: 可数名词复数与谓语一致（The apples are...）。
动名词短语可作名词用（Reading books is...）。
名词所有格：Tom's book；of结构：the top of the mountain。
examples: A book is on the desk.

grammar.title: there be + 名词
grammar.definition: there be 句型表示“某地有某物”，强调“存在”。be 的形式随后面名词单复数与时态变化。
grammar.structure: There is/are/was/were + 名词 + 地点/时间状语
usage: 单数/不可数用 is；复数用 are。
一般疑问句：Is/Are there...? 否定：There isn't/aren't...
可搭配将来：There will be...
不能和 have 混用（there is ≠ have）。
examples: There is a book on the table.
There are two students in the room.
Will there be a test tomorrow?

grammar.title: spend + 时间/钱 + (in) doing sth.
grammar.definition: spend 表示“花费（时间/金钱）”，常用结构为 spend + 时间/钱 + (in) doing。
grammar.structure: spend + 时间/钱 + (in) V-ing
usage: in 常可省略：spend two hours reading。
主语通常是人；如果是物，常用 take/cost。
注意与 pay/cost/take 区分：pay 付钱；cost 花费（物作主语）；take 花费时间（it作形式主语）。
examples: I spend an hour (in) practicing English every day.
He spent 50 dollars buying the book.

grammar.title: from + 名词（from the article）
grammar.definition: from 表示来源、起点或出处，用于说明信息“来自哪里”。
grammar.structure: from + 名词短语
usage: 信息来源：learn/know/get... from ...
可与句型搭配：We learn ... from the article.
注意区别：in the article（在文章里） vs from the article（来自文章）。
examples: We learned the news from the article.
In the article, the writer talks about volunteering.

grammar.title: doing sth. + makes + sb. + adj.
grammar.definition: 动名词短语作主语表示“一件事”，谓语用第三人称单数；make 后可接宾语+形容词作宾补。
grammar.structure: V-ing + ... + makes + sb. + adj.
usage: 动名词短语作主语整体视为单数：Reading books makes...
make + 宾语 + 形容词：make me happy/smarter.
也可用名词作宾补：make him a leader（更进阶）。
examples: Protecting the environment makes our life better.
Reading books makes students more confident.

grammar.title: tell sb.(not) to do sth.
grammar.definition: v.告诉某人(不)做某事

grammar.title: ask sb. to do sth.
grammar.definition: v.要求某人做某事

grammar.title: see sb. do sth.
grammar.definition: v.看见某人做某事(经常发生)

grammar.title: see sb. doing sth.
grammar.definition: v.看见某人正在做某事(偶然发生)

grammar.title: invite sb. to do sth,
grammar.definition: v.邀请某人做某事

grammar.title: volunteer to do sth.
grammar.definition: 自愿做某事

grammar.title: sb spend sometime/money in doing sth
grammar.definition: 某人花...时间/金钱做某事

grammar.title: have trouble in doing sth.
grammar.definition: v.在……有困难

grammar.title: 介词
grammar.definition: 介词；表示时间、地点、方式、原因等关系的词

grammar.title: 连词
grammar.definition: 连词；用来连接词、短语或句子（如 and, but, because）

grammar.title: big 的比较级
grammar.definition: 更大的（big 的比较级）

grammar.title: 疑问句
grammar.definition: 特殊疑问句；用 who/what/when/where/why/how 等开头的问题

grammar.title: 现在时
grammar.definition: does not 的缩写；用于一般现在时第三人称单数的否定

grammar.title: 完成时
grammar.definition: has not 的缩写；用于现在完成时否定/或 have got 的否定等

grammar.title: 代词
grammar.definition: 代词（如 I, you, he, this, that）

grammar.title: 形容词
grammar.definition: 形容词（adjective 的缩写）

grammar.title: 副词
grammar.definition: 副词（adverb 的缩写）

grammar.title: 常用现在完成时表达：have/has already done
grammar.definition: 已经做完（常用现在完成时表达：have/has already done）

grammar.title: 否定句/疑问句中常见变化
grammar.definition: some 变 any（否定句/疑问句中常见变化）

grammar.title: 介词短语作后置定语
grammar.definition: 树上的苹果（介词短语作后置定语）

grammar.title: 修饰 families 的定语从句
grammar.definition: 不是富裕家庭的（修饰 families 的定语从句）

grammar.title: 先翻介词/从句等修饰成分
grammar.definition: 从后往前翻译（先翻介词/从句等修饰成分）

grammar.title: 形容词作宾补
grammar.definition: 让某人变得……（形容词作宾补）
